titleStmt.title: The coppie of the Anti-Spaniard made at Paris by a French man, a Catholique. Wherein is directly proued how the Spanish King is the onely cause of all the troubles in France. Translated out of French into English.
Coppie de l'Anti-Espagnol. English.
titleStmt.author: Arnauld, Antoine, 1560-1619, attributed name.
Hurault, Michel, d. 1592.
Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.

notesStmt.note: A translation by Anthony Munday of the French original, which is attributed to Antoine Arnauld and to Michel Hurault.
In this edition title page line 3 ends: 'Anti-Spaniard'; quires D-F in same setting as STC 684.
Item at reel 644:18 identified as STC 684a.
Reproductions of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
